original_text:
so the next generation would know them,
    even the children yet to be born,
    and they in turn would tell their children.
korean_text: 이는 그들로 후대 곧 태어날 자손에게 이를 알게 하고 그들은 일어나 그들의 자손에게 일러서

sentences.original_text: so the next generation would know them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 다음 세대가 그것들을 알게 되리라

sentences.original_text: even the children yet to be born
and they in turn would tell their children
